PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04702022-05-16,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) expand the list of offences contained in the Canada Marine Act and the regulations made under that Act which could be prosecuted by means of a contraventions ticket; and (2) standardize the options available to enforcement officers.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0101 Publication Date: 2022-06-08
AttachmentsAttachment
